00022 /************************************************
00023  ***               NodeFact                   ***
00024  *** A fact associated with a CFG node by     ***
00025  *** some analysis thatis not evolved as part ***
00026  *** of a dataflow analysis (i.e. it should   ***
00027  *** stay constant throughout the analysis).  ***
00028  ************************************************/
00029 // A fact associated with a CFG node that is not part of a dataflow analysis. In other words, 
00030 // it is not a lattice and is not meant to evolve during the course of a dataflow analysis.
00031 class NodeFact: public printable
00032 {
00033         public:
00034         
00035         // The string that represents this object.
00036         // Every line of this string must be prefixed by indent.
00037         // The last character of the returned string must not be '\n', even if it is a multi-line string.
00038         //virtual string str(string indent="")=0;
00039         
00040                 // returns a copy of this node fact
00041         virtual NodeFact* copy() const=0;
00042         
00043 /*      void* fact;
00044         
00045         public:
00046         NodeFact(void* fact)
00047         {
00048                 this->fact = fact;
00049         }
00050         
00051         NodeFact(factType* fact)
00052         {
00053                 this->fact = *fact;
00054         }
00055         
00056         void* getFact()
00057         {
00058                 return fact;
00059         }*/
00060 };

00063 /**********************************************
00064  ***               NodeState                ***
00065  *** The state of all the Lattice elements  ***
00066  *** associated by dataflow analyses with a ***
00067  *** given node. This state will evolve as  ***
00068  *** a result of the dataflow analysis.     ***
00069  **********************************************/
00070 #ifdef THREADED
00071 class NodeStateHashCompare
00072 { 
00073         public:
00074         NodeStateHashCompare() {}
00075         NodeStateHashCompare(const NodeStateHashCompare & that) {}
00076         
00077         ~NodeStateHashCompare(){}
00078         
00079         static bool equal(const Analysis* & j, const Analysis* & k )
00080         { return j==k; }
00081         
00082         static bool equal(const Analysis* const & j, const Analysis* const & k )
00083         { return j==k; }
00084         
00085         static size_t hash( const Analysis* k ) { return (size_t) k; }
00086 };
00087 #endif
